page.title: 06Lifestyles
page.content:
{PLAYGROUND GAMES IN SCHOOL}
Children of a younger age at our school play chasing games; for example 'stuck in the mud' and also 'pak man'. We found that the boys play games which seemed to be more energetic. The girls went for quieter games such as families and mummys especially.
As we go up the age group the girls get mixed more in with the boys. Girls from the ages 9 and 10 were delighted if they played races with the boys.
Nothing very exciting went on in the age group of 11 and 12. Mostly all the boys played sporty activities. Sometimes the older boys played king_ball and last on high which are forms of tig. The girls just wandered around all break feeling very bored.
